title: Indian AI startups should work towards global leadership: PM Modi
description: New Delhi, Jan 8 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said the world’s trust in India is its biggest strength and emphasised the need to ensure that Indian Artificial Intelligence (AI) models are ethical, unbiased, transparent, and based on data privacy principles. title: Can A.I. Match Molière’s Wit? These Researchers Think So.
description: Scholars and artists at Sorbonne University trained artificial intelligence to imitate the French playwright’s themes, structures and sense of humor. The result is a new play.
content:
